Subject: Custom DLP List
Description: I wanted to check and see if we were able to configure Endpoint Protection to do the following.  What we are wanting to do is produce a master list of account numbers, drivers license numbers, etc., that are specific to our organization.  We would then want to create a policy that references this list and then enforce the action we desire.  Is this something that is possible?
